mean_en: an advertisement; something (such as a short film or a written notice) that is shown or presented to the public to help sell a product or to make an announcement
sentence: Mr. Bao painted the ad on the wall to let more people know about us.
sentence_trans: 包大人把广告被涂在了墙上，让更多的人认识我们百词斩。
sentence_phrase: painted the ad on the wall
